entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Fort Erie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:55 AM EST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Temperature steady near plus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness near noon then 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries or drizzle this afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 70 this morning. Temperature steady near plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries or drizzle this evening then 60 percent chance of flurries late this evening and after midnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Cloudy. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Cloudy. Low zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Low zero. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of rain. High plus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain. Windy. High plus 5. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy periods with 40 percent chance of showers. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 2. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Cloudy. Low plus 1.

entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain. High plus 4. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. High plus 1. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 30%
